name: Sad Knight
description:
Sad Knight was made as submission to Ludum Dare 47.

Game Description

And so the wheel turns again... Sad Knight is a third person adventure game will have you trembling in your boots when you get stuck in the endless loop of Big T's creepy house. Complete all the tasks before you are found, only then can you leave with your life intact.

Developers

Jack McPherson = Gameplay Designer and Programmer
Nichola Humphreys = 3D Asset and Screen Design
Danny Miles = 2D Asset and UI Design

Controls:

Movement = Directional Pads (W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys)
View Tasks = Tab
Interact = Space Bar
